title: Desperate need of help with Ping Issues
body:
Ever since the 11/16 my ping in game has risen from 65-70 to 120+. It never goes below 120 anymore It was fine from morning to afternoon that day but in the night the problem occurred. I have tried everything on my end to solve the problem, resetting League, resetting my router and resetting my computer and using the repair tool in the launcher but to no avail. When I run speedtest.net everything shows to be normal and I only have this higher than normal ping in League of Legends and no other online game that I currently play so I don't think this is a problem on my end. Using the Hextech Repair Tool did not solve my problem. It is hard to play the game because of how laggy it is due to such high ping.
Any help is appreciated.

replies.body: Still couldn't get the problem fixed. Looks like my time with League is done then if this problem doesn't go away. Its been many great years but I just can't play the game with the state that it is in now. :(

Guys, im having some ping issues from last week too.
Is unplayable

plz help

While your internet might be fine, you may be having issues specifically connecting to the game servers.  I know that you've already tried a few troubleshooting steps and the HRT which is great, but I also recommend going over every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to be sure.  Let me know if your issue persists, and we can look into other possibilities, like how your ISP is reaching the game server.  Let me know.

Hi Porocles. Thanks for replying. 

I tried all of the connection issue steps but the problem still persists.

Thanks for trying!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will help.  You'll want to download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs and attach it to your ticket.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can.

Im seeing a lot of posts recently about persons having the same problem on NA and EU. I wonder if it has anything to do with the new beta client even though I haven't installed it this problem started right around the time it was released.

Hi,

I'm having the same issue as you, and it appears many others are too. I'm getting even 3k+ ping from a stable 32. I've gone through the guide that the rioters link to people with connection issues and none of the changes made a difference. Sorry I can't help any, just wanted you to know you're not alone.

Thanks. I saw a few posts with people saying they had this problem from patch 6.22. For me everything was fine then all of a sudden one night this problem came out of nowhere and nothing I do fixes it. Sorry to hear you're having this problem as well.

I have this exact same problem, except my ping goes from 150-500, sometimes even up to 1k. I go on Path of Exile, Diablo 3, Starcraft 2, Heroes of the Storm, and Overwatch and everything runs perfectly at lightning speed. I have this problem with just League ever since I changed to the new client.
Sad to hear you're having this problem too. I really think its something on Riot's end but the thing is I haven't even upgraded to the new client and I am still having these issues.
